text:
@kimguilfoyle @BilldeBlasio @ericgarcetti damn, now kimmy has to quickly find a mayor to blame.

"After testing positive for COVID-19 Kimberly Guilfoyle is expected to drive back to the East Coast in order to avoid interactions with other people. She and Trump Jr. were both expected to attend the Mt. Rushmore event."
